summary: This is a supplement to our report, Managing for Results: Further Progress Made in Implementing the GPRA Modernization Act, but Additional Actions Needed to Address Pressing Governance Challenges , GAO-17-775 . It provides information from our web-based survey of federal managers on certain management topics—such as performance measures that track progress toward an agency's goals, quarterly performance reviews, and program evaluations. This survey was administered...
title: SUPPLEMENTAL MATERIAL FOR GAO-17-775: 2017 Survey of Federal Managers on Organizational Performance and Management Issues
